question: I didn’t forget Ren’s birthday because Anna reminded me about Ren’s birthday.

answers.text: If Anna hadn’t reminded me about Ren’s birthday, I would have forgotten his birthday.
If Anna reminded me about Ren’s birthday, I wouldn’t have forgotten his birthday.
If Anna wouldn’t have reminded me about Ren’s birthday, I would have forgotten his birthday.

correct_answer: If Anna hadn’t reminded me about Ren’s birthday, I would have forgotten his birthday.
